recipesJson.name: Cucumis
recipesJson.author: Nereth
recipesJson.description:
A simple, fresh, cucumber yogourt recipe. Inspired from the famous Tzatziki. Its meant to be a summer vape.
Cap Cucumber is the best cucumber hands down. It might not be really authentic, but its the tastiest.
Flv Spearmint is a very good mint, no gummy note, not peppery. It has that green/vegetable note that adds complexity. I like that.
Cap Creamy Yogurt is awesome, its really soft, not sour like a real fresh yogourt, it adds thickness and a great mouthfeel.
Good as a SNV better after few days.
